summary.span: 启用一个 .NET Framework 数据提供程序，以帮助确保用户具有足够的安全级别来访问数据。

span.span: Enables a .NET Framework data provider to help ensure that a user has a security level adequate for accessing data.

summary.span: 用指定的 值和指示是否允许空白密码的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a class with the specified value, and a value indicating whether a blank password is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举将优先于属性。The enumeration takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果您设置到`false`，则还必须设置到`None`以防止用户使用空密码进行连接。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

summary.span: 将指定连接字符串的访问权限添加到 的现有状态。

span.span: Adds access for the specified connection string to the existing state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现时，此方法会很有用：This method can be useful when implementing: - .NET framework 数据提供程序。A .NET framework data provider. - 一个 API，必须声明为数据访问权限。An API that must assert for data access permission. - 管理工具或安装程序，必须修改安全策略。An administrative tool or installation program that must modify security policy. - 如果指定多个规则，则将选择限制性更强的规则。When more than one rule is specified, the more restrictive rule is selected.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举将优先于属性。The enumeration takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果您设置到`false`，则还必须设置到`None`以防止用户使用空密码进行连接。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.

summary.span: 创建并返回与当前权限对象相同的副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
A copy of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限对象的副本与原始权限对象的资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.

summary.span: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展了安全对象的自定义代码需要实现`ToXml`和`FromXml`可以编码对象安全的方法。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the `ToXml` and `FromXml` methods to make the objects security encodable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
abstract member Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前的权限对象相交的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object to intersect with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限对象的类型相同。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 返回表示当前权限对象和指定权限对象的交集的新权限对象。

span.span: Returns a new permission object representing the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

returns.span: 表示当前权限对象和指定权限对象的交集的新权限对象。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限对象是一个 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: This new permission object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 参数不是 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），并且不是与当前权限对象相同的类的实例。

span.span: The parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: 将用于测试子集关系的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 该对象必须与当前权限对象的类型相同。

span.span: This object must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的权限对象是否为指定权限对象的一个子集。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object.

returns.span: 如果当前权限对象是指定权限对象的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限对象指定一组操作完全包含的指定的权限对象，当前权限对象是指定的权限对象的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限对象表示对受保护资源的访问权限不会超过指定的权限对象。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object.

exception.span: 参数是一个与当前权限对象的类型不同的对象。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展了安全对象的自定义代码必须实现和可以编码对象安全的方法。Custom code that extends security objects must implement the and methods to make the objects security encodable.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission
abstract member Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前的权限对象合并的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限对象的类型相同。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 返回一个新的权限对象，它是当前权限对象和指定权限对象的并集。

span.span: Returns a new permission object that is the union of the current and specified permission objects.

returns.span: 新权限对象，它表示当前权限对象和指定权限对象的并集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果当前权限对象和指定的权限对象的允许表示所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations permitted by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 对象与当前权限对象不属于同一类型。

span.span: The object is not the same type as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview
